title: About Me
articleBody: Ben has a Graduate Diploma in Secondary Education in Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages (TESOL) and Languages Other Than English (LOTE) Vietnamese, qualifications. His passion for language teaching, eLearning and instructional design has enabled him to develop innovative online courses for CIT and eLearn Vietnamese (a passion project) with a focus on consistent and functional, bite size learning design to facilitate learner engagement and rich learning experiences.
